thread.section_title: iMazing Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von iMazing | imazing.com
thread.title: Steven B Chanto
thread.title_full: iMazing bewertet von Steven B Chanto

author: Steven B Chanto
title: Steven B Chanto
text:
The best software! I love it. Very easy to use. Since I've owned it, I rarely use iTunes. I like the fact that the developer(s) keep up with the Apple Updates very nicely, keeping their features working properly.
(Other software ... once the new Apple update came out, some of their features stop working, sometime ....)
Would recommend this software to everybody.
